Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher zu raisonablem Preise zu haben seyen:

Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus4toActa Eruditorum Lipsiensia de Anno 1738 & 17394toMohemii Institutiones histor. Christ. maiores1. Graec.8voNisselii Biblia Hebraea8voBuxtorfii Lexicon8vo","number_of_corrections":47,"explanation":"The original XML was structurally flawed, containing a single item with improperly nested bibliographic entries and character encoding errors. The corrections include: 1. Restructuring the document with a root tag, a

tag for the introduction, and a for the books. 2. Fixing the nesting by creating a distinct element for each of the 10 books. 3. Adding semantic tags by moving edition information and notes inside the relevant tags, using new and tags for clarity. 4. Correcting content by fixing character encoding errors (e.g., 'B√ºcher' to 'Bücher'), misspellings ('Elianus' to 'Aelianus'), and abbreviations."}

Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher zu raisonablem Preise zu haben seyen:

Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus4toActa Eruditorum Lipsiensia de Anno 1738 & 17394toMohemii Institutiones histor. Christ. maiores1. Seculi4toTitus Liviusex Editione Joannis Clerici8voOvidii Tristiam & Epistolae ex Pontomit Sinceri Anmerckungen8voHerodianusGraece & Latine cum notis Bocceri8voAelianusGraece & Latine cum notis Schefferi8voSchrevelii Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.8voNisselii Biblia Hebraea8voBuxtorfii Lexicon8vo
parsed.explanation:
The original XML was structurally flawed, containing a single item with improperly nested bibliographic entries and character encoding errors. The corrections include: 1. Restructuring the document with a root tag, a

tag for the introduction, and a for the books. 2. Fixing the nesting by creating a distinct element for each of the 10 books. 3. Adding semantic tags by moving edition information and notes inside the relevant tags, using new and tags for clarity. 4. Correcting content by fixing character encoding errors (e.g., 'B√ºcher' to 'Bücher'), misspellings ('Elianus' to 'Aelianus'), and abbreviations.
